name: SRI. CH. MALLA REDDY
desc: As Founder Chairman, I am proud to present Plexus, a platform created to inspire innovation, creativity, and collaboration among our students. Plexus goes beyond being a space; it is a mindset that encourages students to challenge norms and explore new frontiers. Through technical, non-technical, and hackathon events, Plexus will empower students to showcaadse their skills, learn from experts, and grow both personally and professionally.

name: SRI. CH. MAHENDER REDDY
desc: As Secretary, I am pleased to introduce Plexus Hub, a dedicated platform for nurturing talent and driving innovation. Plexus offers a variety of events—ranging from technical competitions to non-technical workshops—that are designed to challenge students and enhance their skills. I encourage everyone to participate and use this platform not only for competition but for learning and personal growth.

name: DR. CH. BHADRA REDDY
desc: As President, I am honored to launch Plexus Hub, a forward-thinking initiative aimed at cultivating innovation and excellence. Plexus is not just an event space but a driver of collaboration and creativity. Through technical and creative events, Plexus provides students the opportunity to push boundaries and develop solutions that reflect their full potential. I urge all students to engage fully with this initiative and take advantage of the opportunities it offers.
